   20: 
   21: 
   22: -module(trace_port_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   25:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   26:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   27:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   28: 
   29: -export([call_trace/1,
   30: 	 return_trace/1,
   31: 	 send/1,
   32: 	 receive_trace/1,
   33: 	 receive_trace_non_scheduler/1,
   34: 	 process_events/1,
   35: 	 schedule/1,
   36: 	 gc/1,
   37: 	 default_tracer/1,
   38: 	 tracer_port_crash/1]).
   39: 
   40: %% Needed for apply
   41: -export([erlang_trace/3, erlang_trace_info/2, erlang_trace_pattern/3]).
   42: 
   43: 
   44: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   45: 
   46: suite() ->
   47:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   48:      {timetrap, {seconds, 20}}]. %{minutes, 2}}].
   49: 
   50: all() ->
   51:     trace_sessions:all().
   52: 
   53: groups() ->
   54:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
   55: 
   56: testcases() ->
   57:     [call_trace, return_trace, send, receive_trace,
   58:      receive_trace_non_scheduler,
   59:      process_events, schedule, gc,
   60:      default_tracer, tracer_port_crash].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config, ?MODULE).
   64: 
   65: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   66:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   67: 
   68: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   69:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
   70: 
   71: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   72:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
   73: 
   74: 
   75: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   76:     trace_sessions:init_per_testcase(Config).
   77: 
   78: end_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
   79:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config).
   80: 
   81: 
   82: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
   83:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
   84: 
   85: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
   86:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
   87: 
   88: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
   89:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
   90: 
   91: 
   92: 
   93: %% Test sending call trace messages to a port.
   94: call_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   95:     start_tracer(Config),
   96:     Self = self(),
   97:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, []),
   98:     trace_pid(Self, true, [call]),
   99:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  100:     trace_info(Self, tracer),
  101:     [b,a] = lists:reverse([a,b]),
  102:     expect({trace,Self,call,{lists,reverse,[[a,b]]}}),
  103: 
  104:     trace_pid(Self, true, [timestamp]),
  105:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  106:     Huge = huge_data(),
  107:     lists:reverse(Huge),
  108:     expect({trace_ts,Self,call,{lists,reverse,[Huge]},ts}),
  109: 
  110:     trace_pid(Self, true, [arity]),
  111:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  112:     [y,x] = lists:reverse([x,y]),
  113:     expect({trace_ts,Self,call,{lists,reverse,1},ts}),
  114: 
  115:     trace_pid(Self, false, [timestamp]),
  116:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  117:     [z,y,x] = lists:reverse([x,y,z]),
  118:     expect({trace,Self,call,{lists,reverse,1}}),
  119: 
  120:     %% OTP-7399. Delayed sub-binary creation optimization.
  121:     trace_pid(Self, false, [arity]),
  122:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  123:     trace_func({?MODULE,bs_sum_c,2}, [], [local]),
  124:     26 = bs_sum_c(<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 0),
  125:     trace_func({?MODULE,bs_sum_c,2}, false, [local]),
  126:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>,0]}}),
  127:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<5:4,7:4,11:4>>,3]}}),
  128:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<7:4,11:4>>,8]}}),
  129:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<11:4>>,15]}}),
  130:     expect({trace,Self,call,{?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<>>,26]}}),
  131: 
  132:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, false),
  133:     ok.
  134: 
  135: bs_sum_c(<<H:4,T/bits>>, Acc) -> bs_sum_c(T, H+Acc);
  136: bs_sum_c(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
  137: 
  138: 
  139: %% Test the new return trace.
  140: return_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  141:     start_tracer(Config),
  142:     Self = self(),
  143:     MFA = {lists,reverse,1},
  144: 
  145:     %% Plain (no timestamp, small data).
  146: 
  147:     trace_func(MFA, [{['$1'],[],[{return_trace},
  148:                                  {message,false}]}]),
  149:     trace_pid(Self, true, [call]),
  150:     trace_info(Self, flags),
  151:     trace_info(Self, tracer),
  152:     trace_info(MFA, match_spec),
  153:     {traced,global} = trace_info(MFA, traced),
  154:     [b,a] = lists:reverse([a,b]),
  155:     expect({trace,Self,return_from,MFA,[b,a]}),
  156: 
  157:     %% Timestamp, huge data.
  158:     trace_pid(Self, true, [timestamp]),
  159:     Result = lists:reverse(huge_data()),
  160:     expect({trace_ts,Self,return_from,MFA,Result,ts}),
  161: 
  162:     %% Turn off trace.
  163:     trace_func(MFA, false),
  164:     trace_info(MFA, match_spec),
  165:     {traced,false} = trace_info(MFA, traced),
  166:     ok.
  167: 
  168: %% Test sending send trace messages to a port.
  169: send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     Tracer = start_tracer(Config),
  171:     Self = self(),
  172:     Sender = fun_spawn(fun sender/0),
  173:     trac(Sender, true, [send]),
  174: 
  175:     %% Simple message, no timestamp.
  176: 
  177:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 10)),
  178:     Msg = {some_data,Bin},
  179:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),Msg},
  180:     receive Msg -> ok end,
  181:     expect({trace,Sender,send,Msg,Self}),
  182: 
  183:     %% Timestamp.
  184: 
  185:     BiggerMsg = {even_bigger,Msg},
  186:     trac(Sender, true, [send,timestamp]),
  187:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),BiggerMsg},
  188:     receive BiggerMsg -> ok end,
  189:     expect({trace_ts,Sender,send,BiggerMsg,Self,ts}),
  190: 
  191:     %% Huge message.
  192: 
  193:     HugeMsg = huge_data(),
  194:     Sender ! {send_please,self(),HugeMsg},
  195:     receive HugeMsg -> ok end,
  196:     expect({trace_ts,Sender,send,HugeMsg,Self,ts}),
  197: 
  198:     %% Kill trace port and force a trace.  The emulator should not crasch.
  199: 
  200:     unlink(Tracer),
  201:     exit(Tracer, kill),
  202:     erlang:yield(),				% Make sure that port gets killed.
  203:     Sender ! {send_please,Self,good_bye},
  204:     receive good_bye -> ok end,
  205:     ok.
  206: 
  207: %% Test sending receive traces to a port.
  208: receive_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     start_tracer(Config),
  210:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  211:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive']),
  212: 
  213:     Receiver ! {hello,world},
  214:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',{hello,world}}),
  215: 
  216:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive',timestamp]),
  217:     Huge = {hello,huge_data()},
  218:     Receiver ! {hello,huge_data()},
  219:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,'receive',Huge,ts}),
  220:     ok.
  221: 
  222: %% Test sending receive traces to a port.
  223: receive_trace_non_scheduler(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  224:     start_tracer(Config),
  225:     S = self(),
  226:     Receiver = spawn_link(
  227:                  fun() ->
  228:                          receive
  229:                              go ->
  230:                                  Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(all),
  231:                                  S ! {sync,Ref},
  232:                                  receive {trace_delivered, Ref, all} -> ok end
  233:                          end
  234:                  end),
  235:     trac(Receiver, true, ['receive']),
  236:     Receiver ! go,
  237:     Ref = receive {sync,R} -> R end,
  238:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',go}),
  239:     expect({trace,Receiver,'receive',{trace_delivered, all, Ref}}),
  240: 
  241:     ok.
  242: 
  243: %% Tests a few process events (like getting linked).
  244: process_events(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  245:     start_tracer(Config),
  246:     Self = self(),
  247:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  248:     trac(Receiver, true, [procs]),
  249: 
  250:     unlink(Receiver),				%It is already linked.
  251:     expect({trace,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self}),
  252:     link(Receiver),
  253:     expect({trace,Receiver,getting_linked,Self}),
  254:     trac(Receiver, true, [procs,timestamp]),
  255:     unlink(Receiver),
  256:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self,ts}),
  257:     link(Receiver),
  258:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_linked,Self,ts}),
  259: 
  260:     unlink(Receiver),
  261:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,getting_unlinked,Self,ts}),
  262:     Huge = huge_data(),
  263:     exit(Receiver, Huge),
  264:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,exit,Huge,ts}),
  265: 
  266:     ok.
  267: 
  268: %% Test sending scheduling events to a port.
  269: schedule(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  270:     start_tracer(Config),
  271:     Receiver = fun_spawn(fun receiver/0),
  272:     trac(Receiver, true, [running]),
  273: 
  274:     Receiver ! hi,
  275:     expect({trace,Receiver,in,{?MODULE,receiver,0}}),
  276:     expect({trace,Receiver,out,{?MODULE,receiver,0}}),
  277: 
  278:     trac(Receiver, true, [running,timestamp]),
  279: 
  280:     Receiver ! hi_again,
  281:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,in,{?MODULE,receiver,0},ts}),
  282:     expect({trace_ts,Receiver,out,{?MODULE,receiver,0},ts}),
  283: 
  284:     ok.
  285: 
  286: %% Test sending garbage collection events to a port.
  287: gc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  288:     start_tracer(Config),
  289:     Garber = fun_spawn(fun garber/0, [{min_heap_size, 5000}]),
  290:     trac(Garber, true, [garbage_collection]),
  291:     trace_info(Garber, flags),
  292: 
  293:     trace_info(Garber, flags),
  294:     Garber ! hi,
  295:     expect({trace,Garber,gc_major_start,info}),
  296:     expect({trace,Garber,gc_major_end,info}),
  297: 
  298:     trac(Garber, true, [garbage_collection,timestamp]),
  299:     Garber ! hi,
  300:     expect({trace_ts,Garber,gc_major_start,info,ts}),
  301:     expect({trace_ts,Garber,gc_major_end,info,ts}),
  302: 
  303:     ok.
  304: 
  305: %% Test a port as default tracer.
  306: default_tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  307:     Tracer = start_tracer(Config),
  308:     TracerMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, Tracer),
  309:     Port = get(tracer_port),
  310:     %%
  311:     N = erlang_trace(all, true, [send, {tracer, Port}]),
  312:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(self(), flags),
  313:     {tracer, Port} = erlang_trace_info(self(), tracer),
  314:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(new, flags),
  315:     {tracer, Port} = erlang_trace_info(new, tracer),
  316:     G1 = fun_spawn(fun general/0),
  317:     {flags, [send]} = erlang_trace_info(G1, flags),
  318:     {tracer, Port} = erlang_trace_info(G1, tracer),
  319:     unlink(Tracer),
  320:     exit(Port, done),
  321:     done = receive
  322:                {'DOWN', TracerMonitor, process, Tracer, TracerExitReason} ->
  323:                    TracerExitReason
  324:            end,
  325:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(self(), flags),
  326:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(self(), tracer),
  327:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(new, flags),
  328:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(new, tracer),
  329:     M = erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
  330:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(self(), flags),
  331:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(self(), tracer),
  332:     {flags, []} = erlang_trace_info(G1, flags),
  333:     {tracer, []} = erlang_trace_info(G1, tracer),
  334:     G1 ! {apply,{erlang,exit,[normal]}},
  335:     io:format("~p = ~p.~n", [M, N]),
  336:     M = N - 1, % G1 has been started, but Tracer and Port have died
  337:     ok.
  338: 
  339: tracer_port_crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  340:     Tr = start_tracer(Config),
  341:     Port = get(tracer_port),
  342:     Tracee = spawn(fun () ->
  343:                            register(trace_port_linker, self()),
  344:                            link(Port),
  345:                            receive go -> ok end,
  346:                            lists:reverse([1,b,c]),
  347:                            receive die -> ok end
  348:                    end),
  349:     Tr ! {unlink_tracer_port, self()},
  350:     receive {unlinked_tracer_port, Tr} -> ok end,
  351:     port_control(Port, $c, []), %Make port commands crash tracer port...
  352:     trace_func({lists,reverse,1}, []),
  353:     trace_pid(Tracee, true, [call]),
  354:     trace_info(Tracee, flags),
  355:     trace_info(self(), tracer),
  356:     Tracee ! go,
  357:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  358:     case whereis(trace_port_linker) of
  359:         undefined ->
  360:             ok;
  361:         Id ->
  362:             ct:fail({trace_port_linker, Id})
  363:     end,
  364:     undefined = process_info(Tracee),
  365:     ok.
  366: 
  367: %%% Help functions.
  368: 
  369: huge_data() -> huge_data(16384).
  370: huge_data(0) -> [];
  371: huge_data(N) when N rem 2 == 0 ->
  372:     P = huge_data(N div 2),
  373:     [P|P];
  374: huge_data(N) ->
  375:     P = huge_data(N div 2),
  376:     [16#1234566,P|P].
  377: 
  378: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,info,ts}=Message) ->
  379:     receive
  380:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,_Info,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  381:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  382:             MessageTs;
  383:         Other ->
  384:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  385:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  386:     after 5000 ->
  387:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  388:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  389:     end;
  390: expect({trace,E1,E2,info}=Message) ->
  391:     receive
  392:         {trace,E1,E2,_Info}=MessageTs ->
  393:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  394:             MessageTs;
  395:         Other ->
  396:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  397:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  398:     after 5000 ->
  399:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  400:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  401:     end;
  402: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,ts}=Message) ->
  403:     receive
  404:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  405:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  406:             MessageTs;
  407:         Other ->
  408:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  409:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  410:     after 5000 ->
  411:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  412:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  413:     end;
  414: expect({trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,E4,ts}=Message) ->
  415:     receive
  416:         {trace_ts,E1,E2,E3,E4,_Ts}=MessageTs ->
  417:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [MessageTs]),
  418:             MessageTs;
  419:         Other ->
  420:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  421:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  422:     after 5000 ->
  423:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  424:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  425:     end;
  426: expect(Message) ->
  427:     receive
  428:         Message ->
  429:             ok = io:format("Expected and got ~p", [Message]),
  430:             Message;
  431:         Other ->
  432:             io:format("Expected ~p; got ~p", [Message,Other]),
  433:             ct:fail({unexpected,Other})
  434:     after 5000 ->
  435:               io:format("Expected ~p; got nothing", [Message]),
  436:               ct:fail(no_trace_message)
  437:     end.
  438: 
  439: trac(What, On, Flags0) ->
  440:     Flags = [{tracer,get(tracer_port)}|Flags0],
  441:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace,[What,On,Flags]}},
  442:     Res = receive
  443:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  444:           end,
  445:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  446:                    [What,On,Flags,Res]),
  447:     Res.
  448: 
  449: trace_info(What, Key) ->
  450:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace_info,[What,Key]}},
  451:     Res = receive
  452:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  453:           end,
  454:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_info(~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  455:                    [What,Key,Res]),
  456:     Res.
  457: 
  458: trace_func(MFA, MatchProg) ->
  459:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace_pattern,[MFA,MatchProg,[]]}},
  460:     Res = receive
  461:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  462:           end,
  463:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_pattern(~p, ~p) -> ~p", [MFA,MatchProg,Res]),
  464:     Res.
  465: 
  466: trace_func(MFA, MatchProg, Flags) ->
  467:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace_pattern,[MFA,MatchProg,Flags]}},
  468:     Res = receive
  469:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  470:           end,
  471:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace_pattern(~p, ~p) -> ~p", [MFA,MatchProg,Res]),
  472:     Res.
  473: 
  474: trace_pid(Pid, On, Flags0) ->
  475:     Flags = [{tracer,get(tracer_port)}|Flags0],
  476:     get(tracer) ! {apply,self(),{?MODULE,erlang_trace,[Pid,On,Flags]}},
  477:     Res = receive
  478:               {apply_result,Result} -> Result
  479:           end,
  480:     ok = io:format("erlang:trace(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p",
  481:                    [Pid,On,Flags,Res]),
  482:     Res.
  483: 
  484: start_tracer(Config) ->
  485:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  486:     ok = load_driver(Path, echo_drv),
  487:     Self = self(),
  488:     put(tracer, fun_spawn(fun() -> tracer(Self) end)),
  489:     receive
  490:         {started,Port} ->
  491:             put(tracer_port, Port)
  492:     end,
  493:     get(tracer).
  494: 
  495: load_driver(Dir, Driver) ->
  496:     case erl_ddll:load_driver(Dir, Driver) of
  497:         ok -> ok;
  498:         {error, Error} = Res ->
  499:             io:format("~s\n", [erl_ddll:format_error(Error)]),
  500:             Res
  501:     end.
  502: 
  503: tracer(RelayTo) ->
  504:     Port = open_port({spawn,echo_drv}, [eof,binary]),
  505:     RelayTo ! {started,Port},
  506:     tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port).
  507: 
  508: tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port) ->
  509:     receive
  510:         {apply,From,{M,F,A}} ->
  511:             From ! {apply_result,apply(M, F, A)},
  512:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  513:         {Port,{data,Msg}} ->
  514:             RelayTo ! binary_to_term(Msg),
  515:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  516:         {unlink_tracer_port, From} ->
  517:             unlink(Port),
  518:             From ! {unlinked_tracer_port, self()},
  519:             tracer_loop(RelayTo, Port);
  520:         Other ->
  521:             exit({bad_message,Other})
  522:     end.
  523: 
  524: fun_spawn(Fun) ->
  525:     spawn_link(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]]).
  526: 
  527: fun_spawn(Fun, Opts) ->
  528:     spawn_opt(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]], [link | Opts]).
  529: 
  530: % flush() ->
  531: %     receive
  532: % 	X ->
  533: % 	    [X | flush()]
  534: %     after 2000 ->
  535: % 	    []
  536: %     end.
  537: 
  538: 
  539: %%% Models for various kinds of processes.
  540: 
  541: %% Sends messages when ordered to.
  542: 
  543: sender() ->
  544:     receive
  545:         {send_please, To, What} ->
  546:             To ! What,
  547:             sender()
  548:     end.
  549: 
  550: %% Just consumes messages from its message queue.
  551: 
  552: receiver() ->
  553:     receive
  554:         _Any -> receiver()
  555:     end.
  556: 
  557: %% Does a garbage collection when it receives a message.
  558: 
  559: garber() ->
  560:     receive
  561:         _Any ->
  562:             lists:seq(1, 100),
  563:             erlang:garbage_collect(),
  564:             garber()
  565:     end.
  566: 
  567: %% All-purpose process
  568: 
  569: general() ->
  570:     receive
  571:         {apply, {M, F, Args}} ->
  572:             erlang:apply(M, F, Args),
  573:             general();
  574:         {send, Dest, Msg} ->
  575:             Dest ! Msg,
  576:             general();
  577:         {call_f_1, Arg} ->
  578:             f(Arg),
  579:             general();
  580:         nop ->
  581:             general()
  582:     end.
  583: 
  584: f(Arg) ->
  585:     Arg.
